content.rendered:
About me

Sunaina started her journey at Regent College London in March 2019 in her first full time role as an Academic administrator, later became Executive assistant to the Academic Dean of the college and has now taken up role as Coordinator of Schools. Outside of Regent Sunaina is an aspiring Illustrator.

Key responsibilities

  • Organisation of all delivery to students and potential students of Regent College London
  • Communicate and organise activities undertaken by the academic faculty with various departments
  • Report on the utilisation of resources in each of the schools
  • Carryout activities which support student development and ensures that these are being done by academics
  • Ensure that digital delivery is organised and functional for each of the schools
  • Work with other departments to ensure that activities needed by the schools are targeted and carried out on time and accurately
  • Communicate and track all deliverables
